node.title: Education For Refugees
node.excerpt: Providing refugees a chance to learn, create, equaly partake and succeed.

node.title: ThreeFold Foundation
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation along with its partners is growing the ThreeFold Grid and a new peer-to-peer internet.

node.title: An escape from the Great Hack
node.excerpt: I can’t help but think how unfair it is that in today’s digital society, people are being treated like products, because there is no such thing as a ‘free’ platform without YOU being the product.
